definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: There is no cluster to eat, Nor first-ripe fig, which my soul desires.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一掛可喫，也沒有我魂所羨慕初熟的無花果。

sentences.english: What did that one basket of good figs symbolize?
sentences.chinese: 那筐好無花果預表什麼？

sentences.english: It is first time to discover Serratia ficaria as flocculant-producing bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 首次發現無花果沙雷氏菌可以生產絮凝劑。

sentences.english: The six adults rested on the ground or stretched out along the branches of a wild fig.
sentences.chinese: 六隻成年猩猩在地上或野生無花果樹上睡覺休息。

sentences.english: And in the morning, as they passed by, they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots.
sentences.chinese: 早晨，他們從那裏經過，看見無花果樹連根都枯乾了。

sentences.english: Or "suppose that a chimpanzee arrived at a huge fig tree.
sentences.chinese: 又或是假設一個黑猩猩來到一棵很大的無花果樹下。

sentences.english: A parasitic wasp settles inside a Ficus insipida fig tree fruit to lay its eggs.
sentences.chinese: 一隻寄生蜂正在無花果樹的果實中產卵。

sentences.english: And the trees said to the fig tree, Come thou, and reign over us.
sentences.chinese: 樹木對無花果樹說，請你來作我們的王。

sentences.english: Visitors should take time out to spin along Fig Tree Drive.
sentences.chinese: 遊客們應抽點時間沿着無花果樹大道開車馳騁。

sentences.english: Main crop figs are pyriform with variable necks.
sentences.chinese: 主要作物是可變的脖子無花果梨形。

sentences.english: Notes of dried figs, vanilla and dried flowers appear.
sentences.chinese: 回味中蘊含幹無花果，香草及乾花的幽香。

sentences.english: Tasty as are, figs stand on their own.
sentences.chinese: 正如無花果陷兒餅乾的味道，無花果是很獨樹一幟的。

sentences.english: Tasty as are, figs stand on their own.
sentences.chinese: 正如無花果陷兒餅乾的味道，無花果是很獨樹一幟的。

sentences.english: And presently the fig tree withered away.
sentences.chinese: 那無花果樹就立刻枯乾了。

sentences.english: A ficus tree endured in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 房間角落裏還放着一棵無花果樹。

sentences.english: Fresh fruit is perishable in storage and transport, but suitable for processing.
sentences.chinese: 無花果很難貯運，但適於加工。

definition: red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
fruit (produced by a plant)/(fig.) fruits (of success etc)/results/gains
